definitions.definition: An action performed on a regular basis.
definitions.example: It’s become a habit of mine to have a cup of coffee after dinner.

definitions.definition: An action performed repeatedly and automatically, usually without awareness.
definitions.example: By force of habit, he dressed for work even though it was holiday.

definitions.definition: A long piece of clothing worn by monks and nuns.
definitions.example: It’s interesting how Catholic and Buddhist monks both wear habits.

definitions.definition: A piece of clothing worn uniformly for a specific activity.
definitions.example: The new riding habits of the team looked smashing!

definitions.definition: Form of growth or general appearance of a variety or species of plant or crystal.
